# bignum

## Installation

You can install the development version from GitHub:

``` r
# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("davidchall/bignum")
```

## Usage

```{r}
library(bignum)

biginteger(2)^100L

bigfloat(2.5)^100

# calculate factorial 50!
prod(biginteger(1:50))
```
